Name: Add-DnsClientNrptRule
Synopsis: Adds a rule to the NRPT.

Name: Clear-DnsClientCache
Synopsis: Clears the contents of the DNS client cache.

Name: Get-DnsClient
Synopsis: Gets details of the network interfaces configured on a specified computer.

Name: Get-DnsClientCache
Synopsis: Retrieves the contents of the DNS client cache.

Name: Get-DnsClientGlobalSetting
Synopsis: Retrieves global DNS client settings like the suffix search list.

Name: Get-DnsClientNrptPolicy
Synopsis: Gets the NRPT configured on a computer.

Name: Get-DnsClientNrptRule
Synopsis: Retrieves the DNS client NRPT rules.

Name: Get-DnsClientServerAddress
Synopsis: Gets DNS server IP addresses from the TCP/IP properties on an interface.

Name: Register-DnsClient
Synopsis: Registers all of the IP addresses on the computer onto the configured DNS server.

Name: Remove-DnsClientNrptRule
Synopsis: Removes the specified DNS client NRPT rule.

Name: Set-DnsClient
Synopsis: Sets the interface-specific DNS client configurations on the computer.

Name: Set-DnsClientGlobalSetting
Synopsis: Sets the DNS client global, non-interface specific, settings.

Name: Set-DnsClientNrptGlobal
Synopsis: Modifies the global Name Resolution Policy Table (NRPT) settings.

Name: Set-DnsClientNrptRule
Synopsis: Modifies a DNS client Name Resolution Policy Table (NRPT) rule for the specified namespace.

Name: Set-DnsClientServerAddress
Synopsis: Sets DNS server addresses associated with the TCP/IP properties on an interface.
